%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stconsignment_tmp1
AS
SELECT

    c.id as lms_consignment_id
    ,c.CRef as lms_consignment_cref
    ,c.CDate as lms_consignment_cdate
    ,c.UserID as lms_consignment_userid
    ,c.Appointment as lms_consignment_appointment
    ,c.DeliverBy as lms_consignment_deliverby
    ,c.DeliverByOriginal as lms_consignment_deliverbyoriginal
    ,c.CustAccID as lms_consignment_custaccid
    ,c.BillCust as lms_consignment_billcust
    ,c.DeliverCustID as lms_consignment_delivercustid
    ,c.InServiceReasonID as lms_consignment_inservicereasonid
    ,c.InServiceComment as lms_consignment_inservicecomment
    ,c.LastUpdate as lms_consignment_lastupdate
    ,c.CollectID as lms_consignment_collectid
    ,c.DeliverTypeID as lms_consignment_delivertypeid
    ,c.BillTypeID as lms_consignment_billtypeid
    ,c.LoadID as lms_consignment_loadid
    ,c.TotalCharge as lms_consignment_totalcharge
    ,c.Charge as lms_consignment_charge
    ,c.DocFees as lms_consignment_docfees
    ,c.FuelLevy as lms_consignment_fuellevy
    ,c.TotOtherSurcharges as lms_consignment_totothersurcharges
    ,pbc.lms_parcelbyconsignment_aggrweight
    ,pbc.lms_parcelbyconsignment_aggrchargeweight
    ,pbc.lms_parcelbyconsignment_aggrvolweight
    ,pbc.lms_parcelbyconsignment_aggrvolumiserweight
    ,pbc.lms_parcelbyconsignment_aggrmaxweight
    ,pbc.lms_parcelbyconsignment_aggrnoparcels
    ,pbc.lms_parcelbyconsignment_aggrweightexclspecdel
    ,pbc.lms_parcelbyconsignment_aggrchargeweightexclspecdel
    ,pbc.lms_parcelbyconsignment_aggrvolweightexclspecdel
    ,pbc.lms_parcelbyconsignment_aggrvolumiserweightexclspecdel
    ,pbc.lms_parcelbyconsignment_aggrmaxweightexclspecdel
    ,pbc.lms_parcelbyconsignment_aggrnoparcelsexclspecdel
    ,bcr.id as lms_billconsignmentr_id
    ,bcr.ConsignID as lms_billconsignmentr_consignid
    ,bcr.UpdateDate as lms_billconsignmentr_updatedate
    ,bcr.PickUpRouteID as lms_billconsignmentr_pickuprouteid
    ,bcr.DeliverRouteID as lms_billconsignmentr_deliverrouteid
    ,bcr.ChargeWeight as lms_billconsignmentr_chargeweight
    ,bcr.NoOfParcels as lms_billconsignmentr_noofparcels
    ,bcr.TripDistance as lms_billconsignmentr_tripdistance
    ,bcr.ConsignmentValue as lms_billconsignmentr_consignmentvalue
    ,bcr.BillCust as lms_billconsignmentr_billcust
    ,bcr.RedFlag as lms_billconsignmentr_redflag
    ,bcr.UpdInd as lms_billconsignmentr_updind
    ,bcr.ServiceTypeID as lms_billconsignmentr_servicetypeid
    ,bcr.RouteMissingInd as lms_billconsignmentr_routemissingind
    ,bcr.ChargesCalcInd as lms_billconsignmentr_chargescalcind
    ,bcr.CDate1 as lms_billconsignmentr_cdate1
    ,bcr.InvalidPCode as lms_billconsignmentr_invalidpcode
    ,bcr.ProgramNo as lms_billconsignmentr_programno
    ,bcr.TotRate as lms_billconsignmentr_totrate
    ,bcr.RouteCharge as lms_billconsignmentr_routecharge
    ,bcr.MinWeight as lms_billconsignmentr_minweight
    ,bcr.MinRate as lms_billconsignmentr_minrate
    ,bcr.COrderNo as lms_billconsignmentr_corderno
    ,bcr.CustRef as lms_billconsignmentr_custref
    ,bcr.ManualUpdateFlag as lms_billconsignmentr_manualupdateflag
    ,bcr.PrevBillCustID as lms_billconsignmentr_prevbillcustid
    ,bcr.SpecDelVehicleID as lms_billconsignmentr_specdelvehicleid
    ,bcr.SpecDelMissingRouteFlag as lms_billconsignmentr_specdelmissingrouteflag
    ,bcr.OverBorderFlag as lms_billconsignmentr_overborderflag
    ,bcr.SameDeliverID as lms_billconsignmentr_samedeliverid
    ,bcr.CombineRouteCharge as lms_billconsignmentr_combineroutecharge
    ,bcr.WaybillID as lms_billconsignmentr_waybillid
    ,bcr.RouteLineCount as lms_billconsignmentr_routelinecount
    ,bcr.SameDelCount as lms_billconsignmentr_samedelcount
    ,bcr.AWeight as lms_billconsignmentr_aweight
    ,bcr.VWeight as lms_billconsignmentr_vweight
    ,bcr.CustRef3 as lms_billconsignmentr_custref3
    ,bcr.Units as lms_billconsignmentr_units
    ,bcr.TotSurcharges as lms_billconsignmentr_totsurcharges
    ,bcr.NoOfPallets as lms_billconsignmentr_noofpallets
    ,bcr.InvalidPUDel as lms_billconsignmentr_invalidpudel
    ,bcr.SharikaFlag as lms_billconsignmentr_sharikaflag
    ,bcr.SapID as lms_billconsignmentr_sapid
    ,bcr.TotFuelSurcharge as lms_billconsignmentr_totfuelsurcharge
    ,bcr.TotDocSurcharge as lms_billconsignmentr_totdocsurcharge
    ,bcr.TotOtherSurcharge as lms_billconsignmentr_totothersurcharge
    ,bcr.SpecDel as lms_billconsignmentr_specdel
    ,bcr.QuoteFlag as lms_billconsignmentr_quoteflag
    ,bcr.BillPeriod as lms_billconsignmentr_billperiod
    ,bcr.BillWeekR as lms_billconsignmentr_billweekr
    ,bcr.BillPeriodFlag as lms_billconsignmentr_billperiodflag
    ,bcr.SurhargeFlag as lms_billconsignmentr_surhargeflag
    ,bcr.RecalcFlag as lms_billconsignmentr_recalcflag
    ,bcr.QuoteMissingFlag as lms_billconsignmentr_quotemissingflag
    ,bcr.DeliverTypeID as lms_billconsignmentr_delivertypeid
    ,bcr.TotCovidSurcharge as lms_billconsignmentr_totcovidsurcharge
    ,bcc.sapcode as lms_billbillcustomersr_sapcode
    -- ,l.lms_location_id as lms_consignment_tlocationid
    -- ,l.lms_location_description as lms_consignment_tlocation
    -- ,CASE
    --     WHEN coalesce(bcr.samedelcount,0) > 1 THEN coalesce(bcr.CombineRouteCharge, 0)
    --     ELSE coalesce(bcr.RouteCharge, 0)
    -- END 
    -- + coalesce(bcr.TotFuelSurcharge, 0) 
    -- + coalesce(bcr.TotDocSurcharge, 0) 
    -- + coalesce(bcr.TotOtherSurcharge, 0) 
    -- + coalesce(bcr.TotCovidSurcharge, 0) as lms_billconsignmentr_aggrtotalcharge
    -- ,coalesce(bcr.RouteCharge, 0) as lms_billconsignmentr_aggrstandardcharge
    -- ,CASE
    --     WHEN (coalesce(bcr.samedelcount,0) > 1)THEN coalesce(bcr.CombineRouteCharge, 0)
    --     ELSE 0
    -- END lms_billconsignmentr_aggrsdconsolidatedcharge
    -- ,coalesce(bcr.TotFuelSurcharge, 0) as lms_billconsignmentr_aggrfuelsurcharge
    -- ,coalesce(bcr.TotDocSurcharge, 0) as lms_billconsignmentr_aggrdocsurcharge
    -- ,coalesce(bcr.TotOtherSurcharge, 0) as lms_billconsignmentr_aggrothersurcharge
    -- ,coalesce(bcr.TotCovidSurcharge, 0) as lms_billconsignmentr_aggrcovidsurcharge

FROM
sstconsignemntunion c
LEFT JOIN sstparcelbyconsignment pbc on c.id= pbc.lms_parcelbyconsignment_consignid
LEFT JOIN dbobill_consignmentr bcr on c.id= bcr.consignid and  bcr.rn = 1
LEFT JOIN dbobill_billcustomersr bcc on bcc.billcustid = bcr.billcust
-- LEFT JOIN stparcel_tmp p on p.lms_parcel_consignid = c.id
-- LEFT JOIN stdeliverypickupcustomer dpc on dpc.lms_customer_id = p.lms_parcel_orderdelivercustid
-- LEFT JOIN stsroute sr on sr.lms_sroute_id = dpc.lms_customer_srouteid
-- LEFT JOIN stzone z on z.lms_zone_id = sr.lms_sroute_zoneid
-- LEFT JOIN stlocation l on l.lms_location_id = z.lms_zone_locid

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stconsignment_tmp2
AS
SELECT DISTINCT

p.lms_parcel_consignid,
max(w.poddate) as lms_consignment_maxpoddate

FROM  stparcel p
LEFT JOIN dbowaybill w on w.id = p.lms_parcel_waybillid
WHERE p.lms_parcel_consignid is not null 
AND  p.lms_parcel_locid NOT IN (163,110,213,27)
GROUP BY p.lms_parcel_consignid

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stconsignment_tmp3
AS
SELECT 
    c.*
    ,c2.lms_consignment_maxpoddate
    ,CASE 
	    WHEN (coalesce(c2.lms_consignment_maxpoddate,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) <= (date(c.lms_consignment_deliverby) + interval '86399 seconds') THEN 1
	    ELSE 0
    END lms_consignment_inserviceflag
    ,to_timestamp((cast(to_date(c.lms_consignment_cdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') as string)||' 23:59:59.999')) as  lms_consignment_actualleaddaysstartdate
    ,coalesce(c2.lms_consignment_maxpoddate,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AS lms_consignment_actualleaddaysenddate
    ,(to_unix_timestamp(coalesce(c2.lms_consignment_maxpoddate,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) - (to_unix_timestamp(to_timestamp((cast(to_date(c.lms_consignment_cdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') as string)||' 23:59:59.999')))))/86400 as lms_consignment_actualleaddaysinclwe
    ,to_timestamp((cast(to_date(c.lms_consignment_cdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') as string)||' 23:59:59.999')) lms_consignment_cdateroundup
    ,(to_unix_timestamp(coalesce(c2.lms_consignment_maxpoddate,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) - to_unix_timestamp(to_timestamp((cast(to_date(c.lms_consignment_cdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') as string)||' 23:59:59.999')))) as consignagedifferenceinseconds
FROM stconsignment_Tmp2 c2
LEFT JOIN stconsignment_tmp1 c  ON c.lms_consignment_id = c2.lms_parcel_consignid

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stconsignment_tmp4
AS
SELECT 
    c.lms_consignment_id
    ,sum(holiday)*86400 as holidays
FROM stconsignment_tmp3 c
INNER JOIN dboweekendholiday h on (date(h.DateHoliday) >=  date(lms_consignment_actualleaddaysstartdate) and date(h.DateHoliday) <= date(lms_consignment_actualleaddaysenddate))
GROUP BY c.lms_consignment_id

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stconsignment_tmp5
AS
SELECT 
    c.*
    ,(to_unix_timestamp(c.lms_consignment_actualleaddaysenddate) - to_unix_timestamp(c.lms_consignment_actualleaddaysstartdate) - coalesce(c1.holidays,0))/86400  as lms_consignment_actualleaddays
FROM stconsignment_tmp3 c
LEFT JOIN stconsignment_tmp4 c1 on c1.lms_consignment_id = c.lms_consignment_id

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stconsignment
AS
SELECT 
    *
    ,CASE 
        WHEN lms_consignment_cdate is null THEN 'Not Consigned'
        WHEN lms_consignment_maxpoddate is null THEN 'Not Delivered'
        WHEN (consignagedifferenceinseconds/3600) < 12 THEN '< 12 hrs'
        WHEN (consignagedifferenceinseconds/3600) < 24 THEN '< 24 hrs'
        WHEN (consignagedifferenceinseconds/3600) < 48 THEN '< 2 days'
        WHEN (consignagedifferenceinseconds/3600) < 72 THEN '< 3 days'
        WHEN (consignagedifferenceinseconds/3600) < 96 THEN '< 4 days'
        WHEN (consignagedifferenceinseconds/3600) < 120 THEN '< 5 days'
        WHEN (consignagedifferenceinseconds/3600) < 144 THEN '< 6 days'
        WHEN (consignagedifferenceinseconds/3600) < 168 THEN '< 7 days'
        WHEN (consignagedifferenceinseconds/3600) > 168 THEN '> 7 days'
        ELSE NULL
    END as lms_consignment_age

FROM stconsignment_tmp5
